DbDetails.queryFormat: update hr_overtime_transaction set overtime_status=1491 where hr_overtime_transaction_id='%{hr_overtime_transaction_vLst[hr_overtime_transaction_id]}' and overtime_status is null

DbDetails.DbTable: xbs.hr_overtime_transaction hlt JOIN hr_employee_v he ON hlt.employee_id=he.hr_employee_id LEFT JOIN xbs.sys_pd_header pd ON pd.primary_document='hr_overtime_transaction' AND hlt.hr_overtime_transaction_id=pd.primary_document_id AND pd.status!=325
DbDetails.Where: hr_overtime_transaction_id='%{hr_overtime_transaction_vLst[hr_overtime_transaction_id]}' and hlt.overtime_status=1491 AND sys_pd_header_id IS null

pd.sys_pd_header_id in (select sys_pd_header_id from sys_pd_header where primary_document='hr_overtime_transaction' and primary_document_id='%{hr_overtime_transaction_vLst[hr_overtime_transaction_id]}')
